text: Footnotes in Obsidian Footnotes can be declared by putting, eg. [*1] after some text. Anywhere else in the note you declare the content of the footnote with ([411: . | would like to give this text a reference!/ You can add the contents of the reference in-line as well with *[in-Line referencel In this case I'll just make a citation?/ in-line. Citations can contain links, formatting and backlinks | gave a quote in an earlier note/*/ Notice that it automatically adjusts the numbering of the footnotes in display view The content of the reference in-line citation Halasz, Frank G.
